page.title: 20A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ....
page.content: {Richard Pendleton.} I am 10yrs. old.I get up at 8am.I get dressed and go downstairs.I very rarely have breakfast,so I go outside & play on my bike until my taxi comes to take me on a short journey to school.I play with my friends until school starts at 9.00. We go home at 3.15 and I get changed and play on my bike until teatime and then I go for a ride on my horse {Kristie Wells} I am 10yrs. old.I live in Bodelwyddan.I get up at 7am & then I watch "Popeye" on T.v. at 8am. I have breakfast and I go to school in a taxi.School starts at 9am & in the morning I either do English or Maths & then have playtime.Dinner is at 12noon.At break I play with Claire on the swing.After school I have tea,play,watch T.v.I go to bed at 8pm.
